A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not gonna spoil anything\, but what a disapointment of a movie. Definitely my least favorite of all the movies. So many stupid moments\, & fake outs. Hated what they did with Luke's character & how they handled the rest of the characters to be honest. It almost felt like they read what every the general fanbase has been saying what they want to see & then made sure that doesn't happen. With all the bad character development aside\, the action felt really lackluster too. No lightsaber duel?! Those are what I've lived for since I was 3 years old! There's some really bad CGI & other effects too that I couldn't help but laugh at. A few really great moments happen that got me really excited but I could count those on one hand. In the end the bad unfortunately outweighed the good & I am not eager to go see this one again.
